PerfectNetExp.abs: 家庭成员关系英文翻译_百度知道 ... stepmother 继母 stepson 继子 stepdaughter 继女.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... stepmother 后母，继母 stepson 前夫（或前妻）之子 stepdaughter 前夫（或前妻）之女.

list.abs: Uncle Mike married twice . He has two stepsons ., Mike 叔叔结过两次婚 . 他有两个继子.
femme fatale ( Angie Everhart ) arouses suspicious in her new stepson when the young man arrives home from college to find his father dead .当她的继子从大学回到家中发现父亲死亡，这个让男人痴狂的女同性恋（安琪儿·爱文哈特饰)引起了他的怀疑。

entry.def: Someone's stepson is a son born to their husband or wife during a previous relationship.

means.word_mean: 1. the son your spouse by a former marriage

auth_sentence.content: Carol yelled loud enough for her stepson to hear.

auth_sentence.content: Hatshepsut had usurped her stepson's throne.

auth_sentence.content: Or as a mythic Greek queen in love with her stepson?
